body_html:
Here are the obtained alignments after a few iterations: imgur link

What are the axes? Is decoder step vertical or horizontal? And where is the origin?

score_bias_init was 0 this time, just launched a new experiment with a negative value (-1)

Cool. You may need to try progressively more negative values, and also I do recommend you try setting scale=True.
body_text:
Here are the obtained alignments after a few iterations: imgur link

What are the axes?  Is decoder step vertical or horizontal?  And where is the origin?

score_bias_init was 0 this time, just launched a new experiment with a negative value (-1)

Cool.  You may need to try progressively more negative values, and also I do recommend you try setting scale=True.
body:
> Here are the obtained alignments after a few iterations: imgur link

What are the axes?  Is decoder step vertical or horizontal?  And where is the origin?

> score_bias_init was 0 this time, just launched a new experiment with a negative value (-1)

Cool.  You may need to try progressively more negative values, and also I do recommend you try setting `scale=True`.
